page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {FOOTBALL ROUNDERS LEVERBALL {TENNIS TIG HIDE & SEEK {SQUASH POLO DODGE BALL { { "LEVERBALL" }_This is based on the American game {SOFTBALL},but we have some strange rules.The game has three rounds, with each round having different rules.The aim of the game is to hit a ball with a bat and run round 4 bases to score a point.There are 2 teams ,one fielding and the other batting.The winning team is the one with the most points. {ROUND ONE}_ every member of the team gets a chance to bat.When the whole team is out the other team bats. {ROUND TWO}_ the first four people out knocks out the whole team. {ROUND THREE}_you run round the bases in the"wrong" direction and one catch knocks the whole team out.
